resources.string: Habitable house made entirely of clay. A gem of architecture. Unique in the world. The architect has won several awards for this creation that has been under construction for 13 years and they continue to improve it.

This park is one of the most important hydrographic reserves from Colombia, its surroundings demonstrate the biodiversity that characterizes our country, from its waterfalls and lagoons, to its vast vegetation such as the páramo and the frailejón.
